#include<cstdio>
#include<iostream>
#include<algorithm>
#include<cmath>
#include<cstring>
using namespace std;
#define ll long long
#define mod 1000000007
ll cs,n,r,i,p;
ll be(ll b,ll e)
{
  ll x;
  if(!e)
    return 1;
  x=be(b,e/2);
  x=x*x%mod;
  if(e&1)
    x=x*b%mod;
  return x;
}
int main()
{
  scanf("%lld",&cs);
  while(cs--)
  {
    scanf("%lld%lld",&n,&r);
    for(i=p=1;i<=r;i++)
    {
      p=p*(n+1-i)%mod;
      p=p*be(i,mod-2)%mod;
    }
    printf("%lld\n",p);
  }
  return 0;
}
